TEXT.S:
West saharau West saharasa i labu nu Fey-Cuo, itiza i 24 30 N, 13 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 266,000 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 266,000 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 0 km2,hamin nu tademaw sa 587,020.kakalukan umah sa 18.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 2.70%, zumaay henay umah sa 78.50%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Laayoune.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 0 bulad 0 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Brahim Ghali, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 7 bulad 9 demiad.
likisibinacadan mabulaway atu maaalaw tu kakitidaan7 Sisa-halaitida i Fa-cuonutipan amisan nu kalimucu', idaw ku sadikuday nu Fa-cuokalimadan a kitidaan. itini i mukasian a likisian, matabal nu kun-yun pitu a seci nu A-lapuo-tikuomapalekal itawya, A-lapuoa tademaw mucumud tu i Sisa-halaa niyadu'an, mala angangan nu itiniay a binacadan, tada kumu nuitidaay a A-lapuonu sasakamuen. 15191884 ayda nuni ka icelangan nu O-cuosa, Pu-taw-yaa tademaw i sabaw tu lima a seci midebung tu Sisa-hala, nikudan satu Si-pan-yaa tademaw i sabaw tu siwaw midebung tu tiya niyadu'an, hidasatu i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku sepat a mihcaan pabeli hahtu nuheni ku Si-pan-yaa tademaw itini i sabaw tu siwa a mihcaan midebung tina niyaduan, itini i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku sepat a mihcaan babeniseng nuheni mala Si-pan-ya kabulawan a kitidaan. 1934 tawya, tidaay a tademaw u caaya namin kalecad nu niyadu'an a puo-puoel a tademaw. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku sebat (1934) a mihcaan sumaden han mala Si-pan-yanu hay-way-sen.
nikudan nu sakatusa ani kalpacawan , Europenu paaya kanatal patideng tu sapihantay tu sakabulaw misiteked a kawawan.
atu Sisa-halanu biyaway a Muo-luo-keMawli-tani-yaatu Ael-cili-yatuluay a kanatalan makakilul misiteked, malingatu satu atu duma a kanatal mapulung mihantay tu Sisa-halaa Si-pan-yatu mabulaway mikuwan. 19561957 duma satu u Muo-luo-keitini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku enem (1965) a mihcaan satabalay kunuheni misiteked, i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku pitu (1957) a mihcaan Muo-luo-kepagihasa sa musakamu u Sisa-halauniyam anikuwanan sa.
kilul satu misitekeday a Mawli-tani-yaatu Ael-cili-yaatu Muo-luo-kemalingatu milihida a cinglaw. 19651975 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku lima (1965) a mihcaan kasaupu nu paykanatalsakamusa tu Sisa-halaa caay kaw kalimadan sa. namakayda i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku lima (1975) a mihcaan, kasaupu nu paykanatalkinapina malaheci ku sakay Sisa-halaa kawaw, sakamusa ku Sisa-halaa tademaw amana' pialaw tu nabalucuan niyam atu pisitekedan niyam a kinli. 1973"" cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku tulu (1976) a mihcaan, tidaay a tademaw nu Saha-lamisiteked tu kawaw " Sisa-halaa tademaw nu mialesay" a patideng, mipadang ku Ael-cili-yaa pacuked, atu Muo-luo-keatu Mawli-tani-yamasula'cus. 1975""35 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku lima (1975) a mihcaan, Muo-luo-keci Ha-san kuo-wancaay pitengal tu Lanhekuo Hayya-kuocifuoing tu Saha-lanabalucuan a kawaw, palekal tu "langdaway anipiculil", tulu a bataan idaw ku lima a mang nu Muo-luo-kea tademaw milihida tunikabulawan nuamicumud. tuyda a mihcaan, miliyas ku Si-pan-yatiya niyaduan.[1]
kitakit masasucili"" aydatu nu Cuotun paifiamabawbaw ku cen-cenu kawaw, "Arabnu sadingsing" malalidtu ku paifaa niyaduan, Sisa-halaa kawaw mala mikankiay tu niyaduay a kanatal tu lalabu sakay hekal a kawawan. 2016·· tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku enem (2016) a mihcaan, Sisa-haa tademaw ci Muhan-muode. Apu-tule-acice. Ayce-tin (··) mapatay, macunus kunika utiih amasasudang tu Sisa-hala2017128 pinatu a mihcaan, Muo-luo-kei tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku pitu (2017) a mihcaan cacay a bulad tu saka tusa a bataan idaw ku walu (28) a kawaw nu Africa Unionnu sitangahay a tademaw nu nipikaygiyan mitadikud henay amicumud tu Famun, nika SaharaAraba micu kapulungan a kanatalcaay ka tadikud kunuheni. 6738 ayda, idaw ku enemay a bataan idaw ku pitu (67) a Linhekuo a tademaw palekal tu Muo-luo-kepapatahekal tu West saharaa kawaw, kya nu tuluay a bataan idaw ku walu (38) a kanatalan mihang tu Arabic Saharamincu pulung nu kanatal.
Amilikakatukuh ayda palutatenga tu Moroccomisuayw tu West saharaa kawaw a Sifuna kanatal, sisa, len-hekuo nu kanatala tademaw misuayw tina kawawan caay namin kalecad ku nabalucuan. [2]
demiad200;450 tada u likelikenan a kakitidaan, adidi' ku langdaway a tukusan, u likelikenan namin. nutipan mililisay tu bayu a niyadu isasa ku lala masaenal, talakaw han tusa a lasubu (200) a depah; nuwalian a niyadu' talakaw, talakaw han makaala tu sepat a lasubu lima a bataan (450) a depah. 800 walian amisan talakaw han makaala tu walu a lasubu (800) a lawat satalakaway nu niyaduan. talakaw nu buyu idaw ku naggay, u Saci-eihala-kansatabakiay nu sauwac, inai' ku mihcaan nanay nu tatengaay a lalaliwan tu nanum. 10011℃~14℃ kacaledesan nu likenlikenan, mihcaan nikahetik nu udad han cacay a bataan (100) a hau-mi, idaw ku duma a niyaduan pinatu a mihcaan caay kahetikan nu udad. demiad masasungaliw ku demiad, kasasubelih nu demiad han sabaw cacay a du~sabaw sepat a du. 40 kanai'an nu udad, makedal, halemhem u West saharapicidekan ademiad. u mililis tu Tasi-yungnu Laayoune, Dahraa niyadu'an tunikahetikan nu udad han sepat (40) a huw-mi kuni kahetikan.[3]
